title: Subhalekha Diamond and Gemstone Nakshi Haaram
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a delicate blend of traditional nakshi work and modern design elements. The floral-inspired chain culminates in a central pendant featuring a vibrant emerald surrounded by sparkling diamonds and ruby accents. The pendant gracefully suspends elegant gold ghungroo droplets. The Hyderabadi polish accentuates the intricate detailing, lending a rich, antique-inspired luster.
occasions: a sophisticated choice for upscale cultural events and festive gatherings.
description: A true statement piece embodying timeless elegance and cultural significance. The rare combination of precious gemstones, intricate nakshi craftsmanship, and Hyderabadi polish makes this necklace a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. Its modern design ensures versatility, allowing it to be worn with both traditional sarees and contemporary outfits. A symbol of prosperity and good fortune, this Haaram is destined to become a cherished heirloom.
